name: JAPAN NFT. Pink diamond and a Cat of happiness 招 き 猫
description: NFT country of Japan.The base is crafted from a precious pink diamond, like Sakura, with a solid gold edging. She is held by Torii Один 居 (One of the symbols of Japan) made of red ruby and gold, she stands on a stand that emits an electromagnetic pulse, thereby creating waves like an ocean that surrounds great Japan. (The switch is located on the side rear of the bottom stand). The bottom stand is made of natural pearls and is surrounded by green Bamboo from green crystal. There are 4 Japanese bronze warriors standing and guarding it. On the sides, with the help of a winding mechanism, Japanese Shoji (я 子) are moved apart, Sumo from different materials emerge from them, as if they are going to fight. The Japanese symbol Maneki-neko (я き 猫) cat rides around the perimeter. (Happiness cat). On the back side wall is the appearance of a Bonsai.
